product_name: Patagonia Capilene 2 Lightweight Long Underwear Zip-T - Men's
long_description: A moisture-wicking next-to-skin layer for cool weather, the Patagonia Capilene 2 Lightweight long underwear Zip-T ventilates when your inner heat builds, but insulates when skies turn dark. Open knit promotes airflow, is inherently stretchy and provides excellent wicking for endurance activities in cool to moderate temperatures. Fabric provides UPF 20 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Polygiene(R) permanent odor control resists odors so you can breathe easy after a long day of activity. Deep front zipper ventilates instantly to keep you cool during exertion, and thumb loops hold sleeves over wrists for warmth. Shoulders with offset seams won't chafe beneath pack straps and side seams roll forward to minimize abrasion. The Patagonia Capilene 2 Lightweight long underwear Zip-T features a rib-knit neckline that's soft next to skin.
